Title: Microsoft Purview: Information Protection-Email attachment Preview in Activity Explorer
Description:
We're enhancing Activity Explorer to provide greater visibility into sensitive data flagged in Exchange Online. Previously, only the message body was viewable, which limited insight into flagged content. With this update, admins will be able to preview email attachments directly within Activity Explorerâ€”without needing to download the email.
GA date: January CY2026
Preview date: December CY2025
